specsKey: Nikon Coolpix L31 Point & Shoot Camera

Focal Length: Angle of View Equivalent to that of 26 - 130 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format, Digital Zoom Magnification: 35 mm (135) Equivalent 520 mm, Focus Range: All Distances Measured from Center of Front Surface of Lens
Focusing Range: 50 cm (1 ft 8 inch) - Infinity (W), 80 cm (2 ft 8 inch) - Infinity (T)
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.
USB Connector: Supports Direct Print (PictBridge), Used as Audio / Video Output Connector
Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes
Matrix, Center-weighted (Digital Zoom Less than 2x), Spot (Digital Zoom 2x or More)
